results.name: Number of distinct squarefree numbers in row n of Pascal's triangle.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
example: a(10)=3 because in row 10 of A007318 we observe the three squarefree numbers 1, 10 and 210.
maple: for k from 0 to n do
xref: Cf. A048276 (number of squarefree numbers in the entire row), A238336.
